pr_title: WFLY-12586 Duplicated classes in test suite, content slightly differs in some cases

timeline.message: WFLY-12586 Duplicated classes in testsuite, content slightly differs in some cases

timeline.bodyText: Would you mind moving also the license header to the common file? I would say it is not mandatory for merging, but we should keep the pattern we already have.
timeline.author: yersan

timeline.bodyText: Actually if the header is missing this is mandatory for merging, I know some other projects have relaxed that requirement but the WildFly Core and WildFly repos have mixed licensing so I believe we do still require the header to correctly identify on a file by file basis.
timeline.author: darranl

replies.bodyText: Sure. I will move the license header.
replies.author: parsharma
